concept.title: Hadoop FS
concept.shortdesc: The Hadoop FS origin reads data from the Hadoop Distributed File System (HDFS). You can read log, JSON, or text data with the Hadoop FS origin. Use this origin only in pipelines configured for cluster execution mode.

conbody.p: Hadoop FS originovervieworiginsHadoop FSWhen you configure the Hadoop FS origin, you specify the directory path and data format for the data. You can configure the origin to read from all subdirectories and to generate a single record for records that include multiple objects.
